snippet: A group of scientists is trying to graft existing smaller trees into one huge tree of life that includes every known species, a tree with two million branches and counting.
abstract: Group of scientists lead by Dr Karen Cranston is trying to construct a master 'tree of life' diagram that would demonstrate the evolutionary relationship between all known species of life; tree, which would eventually have almost 2 million branches, is based upon a work detailed by Charles Darwin in book On the Origin of Species.
lead_paragraph: A group of scientists is trying to graft existing smaller trees into one huge tree of life that includes every known species, a tree with two million branches and counting.

headline.seo: Open Tree of Life Project Draws In Every Twig and Leaf
headline.main: Tree of Life Project Aims for Every Twig and Leaf
headline.print_headline: Tree of Life Project Aims for Every Twig and Leaf
